Sentencas: Global warming potential (GWP) of N2O is 310 times that of CO2.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: However, conventional solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode catalytic N2O decomposition has been observed to have a low conversion rate, leading to uneven temperature distribution on the cathode surface.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: To address this issue, we proposed a novel gas-solid phase fluidized bed catalytic electrode for N2O decomposition in a SOFC system.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: The fluidized bed material was prepared using cerium oxide particles coated with lanthanum, strontium, and iron (CeO2-LSF).
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: The N2O conversion rate was 99.78% at 720 degrees C.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: By assisting particle fluidization with argon, compared to the case of fixed bed electrode, the peak power density improved by a maximum of 39.86% at 670 degrees C.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: This improvement was due to mass transfer enhancement by particle fluidization, thereby reducing the concentration polarization of the SOFC.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: Furthermore, the maximum temperature difference inside the reactor decreased significantly from 92 degrees C to 42 degrees C when the cathode particles were fluidized.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition

Sentencas: The reactor can achieve high-efficiency decomposition of N2O while simultaneously improving fuel cell power density and operational reliability.
Titulo: A novel fluidized-bed-electrode solid-oxide-fuel-cell reactor for N2O catalytic decomposition
